00052 {
00053         wxString wxbuild;
00054 
00055         wxbuild << _T("< GNR 3D Raumplaner >\n\n");
00056         wxbuild << _T("#if defined(ENTWICKLER)\n");
00057         wxbuild << _T(" #include \"Konstantin_Balabin.h\"\n");

00060         wxbuild << _T(" #include \"Valentin_Kunz.h\"\n");
00061         wxbuild << _T("#endif");
00062 
00063         return wxbuild;
00064 }

00205 MainFrame::MainFrame(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID WXUNUSED(id))
00206 {
00207         int width  = SOFTWARE_WIN_WIDTH;
00208         int height = SOFTWARE_WIN_HEIGHT;
00209 
00210         //build title from define
00211         wxString title;
00212         title << wxT(SOFTWARE_TITLE) << wxT(" [Version ") << wxT(SOFTWARE_VERSION) << wxT("]");
00213 
00214         //create main frame and set size
00215         Create(parent, wxID_ANY, title, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE, _T("wxID_ANY"));

00368         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddTool(btn_rotate_xz, _("Rotieren auf X-Z-Achsen"), wxBitmap(wxIcon(button_world_rotate_xz_xpm)), wxNullBitmap, wxITEM_RADIO, _("Rotieren auf X-Z-Achsen   [F7]"), _("Rotieren auf X-Z-Achsen"));
00369         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddTool(btn_rotate_xy, _("Rotieren auf X-Y-Achsen"), wxBitmap(wxIcon(button_world_rotate_xy_xpm)), wxNullBitmap, wxITEM_RADIO, _("Rotieren auf X-Y-Achsen   [F8]"), _("Rotieren auf X-Y-Achsen"));
00370         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddTool(btn_draw_walls, _("Wände zeichnen"), wxBitmap(wxIcon(button_draw_walls_xpm)), wxNullBitmap, wxITEM_RADIO, _("Wände zeichnen   [F9]"), _("Wände zeichnen"));
00371         ToolBar1->AddSeparator();
00372         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddTool(btn_zoom_in, _("Draufsicht einzoomen"), wxBitmap(wxIcon(button_canvas2d_zoom_in_xpm)), wxNullBitmap, wxITEM_NORMAL, _("Draufsicht einzoomen   [PGUP]"), _("Draufsicht einzoomen"));
00373         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddTool(btn_zoom_out, _("Draufsicht auszoomen"), wxBitmap(wxIcon(button_canvas2d_zoom_out_xpm)), wxNullBitmap, wxITEM_NORMAL, _("Draufsicht auszoomen   [PGDN]"), _("Draufsicht auszoomen"));
00374         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddTool(btn_camera_reset, _("Kamera zurücksetzen"), wxBitmap(wxIcon(button_canvas2d_zoom_fit_xpm)), wxNullBitmap, wxITEM_NORMAL, _("Kamera zurücksetzen   [HOME]"), _("Kamera zurücksetzen"));
00375         ToolBar1->AddSeparator();
00376 
00377         //toggle button for snap to grid function
00378         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddTool(btn_snap_to_grid, _("Einrasten aktivieren"), wxBitmap(wxIcon(button_snap_to_grid_xpm)), wxNullBitmap, wxITEM_CHECK, _("Einrasten aktivieren   [F4]"), _("Einrasten aktivieren"));
00379         ToolBar1->AddSeparator();
00380 
00381         //build input for grid snapping
00382         SpinCtrlTranslate = new wxSpinCtrl(ToolBar1, ID_SPINCTRL_TRANS, _T("Schrittweite in mm"), wxPoint(0,0), wxSize(55,20), 0, SNAP_IN_MINIMUM_UNIT, SNAP_IN_MAXIMUM_UNIT, 10, _T("ID_SPINCTRL_TRANS"));
00383         StaticText1       = new wxStaticText(ToolBar1, ID_STATICTEXT1, _(" mm"), wxPoint(3,13), wxSize(20,12), 0, _T("Schrittweite in mm"));
00384         SpinCtrlTranslate->SetValue(_T("500"));
00385         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddControl(SpinCtrlTranslate);
00386         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddControl(StaticText1);
00387         ToolBar1->AddSeparator();
00388 
00389         //build input for rotation snapping
00390         SpinCtrlRotate = new wxSpinCtrl(ToolBar1, ID_SPINCTRL_ROTATE, _T("Schrittweite in Grad"), wxPoint(0,0), wxSize(44,20), 0, SNAP_IN_MINIMUM_DEGREE, SNAP_IN_MAXIMUM_DEGREE, 10, _T("ID_SPINCTRL_ROTATE"));
00391         StaticText2    = new wxStaticText(ToolBar1, ID_STATICTEXT2, _(" Grad"), wxPoint(3,13), wxSize(30,12), 0, _T("Schrittweite in Grad"));
00392         SpinCtrlRotate->SetValue(_T("45"));
00393         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddControl(SpinCtrlRotate);
00394         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddControl(StaticText2);
00395         ToolBar1->AddSeparator();
00396 
00397         //build exit button at the end
00398         ToolBarItem[c++] = ToolBar1->AddTool(btn_quit, _(" beenden"), wxBitmap(wxIcon(button_exit_xpm)), wxNullBitmap, wxITEM_NORMAL, _(" beenden   [ALT+F4]"), _(" beenden?"));
00399         ToolBar1->Realize();
00400         SetToolBar(ToolBar1);
00401         //Center();
00402 
00403         //turn on snapping on menu by default
00404         ToolBar1->ToggleTool(btn_snap_to_grid,true);
00405         MenuItem9->Check(true);
00406         MenuItem32->Check(true);
00407 }

00413 void MainFrame::OnMenuNewRoom(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00414 {
00415         int answer = wxMessageBox(wxT("Wollen Sie den Raum wirklick leeren?"), wxT("Sind Sie sicher?"), wxYES_NO, this);
00416         if (answer == wxYES)
00417         {
00418                 NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00419                 gnrevent.setGNREventType(NEWROOM);
00420                 GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00421         }
00422 }

00424 void MainFrame::OnMenuOpxOpen(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00425 {
00426         int answer = wxMessageBox(wxT("Wollen Sie den aktuellen Raum wirklick ersetzen?"), wxT("Sind Sie sicher?"), wxYES_NO, this);
00427         if (answer == wxYES)
00428         {
00429                 const wxString& filename = wxFileSelector(wxT("Szene als OPX öffnen..."), wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT("OpxDatei (*.opx)|*.opx"));
00430 
00431                 // look if string is not empty
00432                 if (!filename.IsEmpty())
00433                 {
00434                         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00435                         gnrevent.setGNREventType(OPXOPEN);
00436                         gnrevent.SetString(filename);
00437 
00438                         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00439                 }
00440         }
00441 }

00638 void MainFrame::OnCreateScreenshot(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00639 {
00640         wxString filetypes;
00641         filetypes << wxT("PNG (*.png)|*.png");
00642         filetypes << wxT("|JPEG (*.jpg)|*.jpg");
00643         filetypes << wxT("|BMP (*.bmp)|*.bmp");
00644         filetypes << wxT("|TIFF (*.tif)|*.tif");
00645         const wxString& filename = wxFileSelector(wxT("Screenshot speichern unter..."), wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT(""), filetypes, wxFD_SAVE);
00646 
00647         if (!filename.IsEmpty())
00648         {
00649                 NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00650                 gnrevent.SetString(filename);
00651                 gnrevent.setGNREventType(SCREENSHOT);
00652 
00653                 GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00654         }
00655 }

00687 void MainFrame::OnSnapToGridCtrl(wxSpinEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00688 {
00689         OnSnapToGrid();
00690 }
00691 
00692 void MainFrame::OnSnapToGrid()
00693 {
00694         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00695         gnrevent.setGNREventType(SNAPTOGRID);
00696 
00697         int snapGrid  = SpinCtrlTranslate->GetValue();
00698         int snapAngle = SpinCtrlRotate->GetValue();
00699 
00700         if (!ToolBarItem[14]->IsToggled())
00701         {
00702                 snapAngle = 1;
00703                 snapGrid  = 1;
00704         }
00705 
00706         gnrevent.setSnapToGrid(snapGrid);
00707         gnrevent.setSnapToAngle(snapAngle);
00708 
00709         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00710 }

00805 void MainFrame::OnZoomIn(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00806 {
00807         simulateMouseWheel(-10);
00808 }
00809 
00810 void MainFrame::OnZoomOut(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00811 {
00812         simulateMouseWheel(10);
00813 }
00814 
00815 void MainFrame::simulateMouseWheel(int direction)
00816 {
00817         wxMouseEvent event(wxEVT_MOUSEWHEEL);
00818         GLNotifyEvent myevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GL_NOTIFY);
00819         event.m_wheelRotation = direction*120;
00820         myevent.setMouseEvent(event);
00821         myevent.setCanvasID(CANVAS2D);
00822         myevent.SetEventObject(this);
00823         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(myevent);
00824 }
00825

00827 {
00828         return  StatusBar;
00829 }
